abstract: Google may have some quirky ideas about company-sponsored day care, but an eccentric policy here and there will likely do little to dent the Internet giant’s sterling reputation.
snippet: Google may have some quirky ideas about company-sponsored day care, but an eccentric policy here and there will likely do little to dent the Internet giant’s sterling reputation.
lead_paragraph: Google may have some quirky ideas about company-sponsored day care, but an eccentric policy here and there will probably do little to dent the Internet giant’s sterling reputation.

abstract: We’ve written a lot about the privacy concerns raised by Google and other companies tracking users’ activities on the Web, but the tracking has upsides, too.
snippet: We’ve written a lot about the privacy concerns raised by Google and other companies tracking users’ activities on the Web, but the tracking has upsides, too.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE | 2:29 PM Modified to note that the new feature of Gmail is being rolled out slowly to Gmail users and isn’t on all accounts yet.

headline.main: Google’s Tracking of Users Can Also Increase Privacy Protection
